name: stata-runner
description: Run Stata code from VS Code using runStata.exe

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && editorLangId == 'ado' || editorTextFocus && editorLangId == 'mata' || editorTextFocus && editorLangId == 'stata'
editorTextFocus && editorLangId == 'ado' || editorTextFocus && editorLangId == 'mata' || editorTextFocus && editorLangId == 'stata'

stata-runner.stataPath.description: Full path to the Stata executable (including filename). Example: C:\Program Files\Stata18\StataMP-64.exe. Path must not contain Chinese characters or special characters.

stata-runner.stataWindowTitle.description: Stata window title (must exactly match actual window title). Default matches Stata/MP 18.0. Modify for other versions. Example: 'Stata/SE 17.0'

stata-runner.stataCommandHotkey.description: Hotkey for activating Stata command window (AutoHotkey format). Default ^1 for Ctrl+1. Format example: ^!c for Ctrl+Alt+C

stata-runner.tempFilePath.description: Temporary do file save path (relative to workspace). Default: __do_tempfile__.do. WARNING: Existing files with same name will be overwritten. Recommended to keep default.

stata-runner.runStataPath.description: Full path to runStata.exe (must be in same directory as package.json). Example: C:\Users\kerry\Downloads\runStata\runStata.exe [Windows only]
